- [ ] Load scripts:
	- [ ] how to tell if they are loaded
	You can give your dynamically loaded script a name so that it shows in the Chrome/Firefox JavaScript debugger.   
	To do this you place a comment at the end of the script:
```
	//# sourceURL=filename.js
```
	(https://stackoverflow.com/questions/9092125/how-to-debug-dynamically-loaded-javascript-with-jquery-in-the-browsers-debugg)
